text: Ashton Lambie (born December 12, 1990) is an American track cyclist known for his Trans-Kansas record, as well as for being a former Individual pursuit world record holder. ==Career== Lambie races on gravel in Kansas. In his debut at the Track National Championship, Lambie won the Individual Pursuit, and finished second in the omnium and points race. This earned Lambie a spot on Team USA. His first race with Team USA was the 2017 Pan-American Championships. ==Major results== ;2017 :National Track Championships ::1st 20px Individual pursuit ::2nd Omnium ::2nd Points race :3rd UCI Track Cycling World Cup (Team pursuit) ;2018 :National Track Championships ::1st 20px Individual pursuit ::3rd Omnium :Pan American Championships ::1st 20px Individual pursuit ::1st 20px Team pursuit ==World records== {| class="wikitable" |- !
